title: A godlie, zealous, and profitable sermon vpon the second chapter of Saint Iames. Preached at London, by Master George Gifford, and published at the request of sundry godly and well disposed persons
author: Gifford, George, d. 1620.
publisher: [By Thomas East] for Tobie Cooke, dwelling at the Tigers head in Paules Churchyard,
notes: Running title reads: A sermon on the second of S. Iames.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
